content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position(-5.0, -67.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -67.0)

### Coal Mining Setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) for coal extraction (exact position not specified)

### Iron Plate Smelting Setup
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -5.0, -67.0) for smelting iron plates

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to smelting timeout
- Ensure that the furnace has enough fuel and required ingredients before attempting to smelt. Check the inventory for necessary items.

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Make sure you have the required items in your inventory before trying to insert them into the furnace. Check your inventory for coal and iron ore.

### Errors when placing entities too far away
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity. The maximum distance for placing entities is 10 tiles.

### Errors when trying to get entities that do not exist
- Verify that the entity you are trying to access is present at the specified position. If it has been removed or never placed, you will not be able to get it.

### Errors when setting recipes for furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is operational and has the necessary ingredients before attempting to set a recipe. If the furnace is empty or not functioning, it will not accept a recipe.
